summary: The Senior Savings Protection Act (S. 2466) aims to extend funding for outreach and assistance for low-income programs. Specifically, it amends Section 119 of the Medicare Improvements for Patients and Providers Act of 2008 to allocate funding for State health insurance assistance programs, area agencies on aging, aging and disability resource centers, and coordination of efforts to inform older Americans about benefits, allocating funds for each from fiscal year 2026-2030.
